name: Avoid (itch) (RipTide Studio)
description:
The full version will be available for free, there will also be no need to pay to download it, you just need to click on the "download button" and it will start downloading

THE TASK IN GAME

At the start of the game you the player will have a small white character at the helm of your control and you have to guide the character to AVOID all the incoming obstacles coming your way by moving your mouse in the direction you want the character to go
